hymn.title: Glory! Glory! Christ is life in me

layout.singingstanza: Glo -- ry! Glo -- ry! Christ is life in me, As the Spir -- it lead -- ing con -- stant -- ly! What was weak is might -- y, What was dark is light, Glo -- ry! Glo -- ry! Christ is life in me!

lyrics.stanza: Glory! Glory! Christ is life in me, As the Spirit leading constantly! What was weak is mighty, What was dark is light, Glory! Glory! Christ is life in me!
Glory, Glory! Living by the Lord, Walking by the Spirit in His Word! Failure's turned to vict'ry, Sighing's turned to praise. Glory! Glory! Living by the Lord!
